title: A Fishy problem
creator_credit: Astrid Silberman, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
brief_description: Astrid Silberman attempts to recreate her family recipe for Gefilte fish. She has trouble deciding whether to follow the traditional recipe or to come up with a new interpretation on the old tradition. This Digital Storytelling project was created in partnership with the Jewish Museum of Australia.
